meanings.definition: Recognize or treat (someone or something) as different.
meanings.sent1: She distinguishes between right and wrong easily.
meanings.sent2: His unique talent distinguishes him from the rest of the team.
meanings.sent3: The detective's keen eye for detail distinguishes her as the best in town.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter distinguishes her as the sunshine in our group.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the flower distinguishes it from the others in the garden.

meanings.definition: Make (someone or something) stand out from others by contrasting qualities.
meanings.sent1: The black coat distinguishes her in the sea of white dresses.
meanings.sent2: His exceptional speed distinguishes him as the fastest runner in the school.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse distinguishes itself by outsmarting the big cat.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness distinguishes her as a beacon of light in a world of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The loud alarm sound distinguishes it from the other notifications on his phone.

meanings.definition: Be a characteristic that sets (someone or something) apart from others.
meanings.sent1: His honesty distinguishes him as a trustworthy friend.
meanings.sent2: The unique design of the building distinguishes it from the rest of the cityscape.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot distinguishes itself by mimicking everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her determination distinguishes her as a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The strong aroma of the dish distinguishes it from the other items on the menu.
